rule.description: Example of rule that will ignore sshd
arpwatch probably run with wrong permissions
XXX Could not connect to socket
arp info has been overwritten for a host
A filesystem was not properly unmounted, likely system crash
UKC was used, possibly modifying a kernel at boot time.
A soft error has been corrected on a hard drive,
this is a possible early sign of failure.

rule.match: Filesystem is not clean - run fsck
Filesystem is not clean - run fsck
rule.description: A filesystem is not clean and a fsck is necessary.
hp-scan could not find a printer

rule.match: error: Unable to setup multicast socket for SLP
error: No devices found on bus:
rule.description: hp-setup could not find a printer
A proper ID was not specified for hp-makeuri

rule.match: error: Not found. SANE backend 'hpaio' NOT properly setup

rule.description: errors and/or warnings were found in the configuration
hp-makeuri could not find the printer device

rule.match: error no hp_model environment variable set
rule.description: Please set the hp_model environment variable
cvsyncd cannot write pid file with current permissions

rule.match: zone transfer deferred due to quota

rule.description: Hostname contains characters that check-names does not like

rule.regex: refresh: retry limit for master \S+ exceeded

rule.description: Zone has been removed from a master server

rule.regex: loading from master file \S+ failed: not at top of zone
rule.description: XXX not at top of zone

rule.match: reloading configuration failed: unexpected end of input
option 'masters' is not allowed in 'master' zone
rule.description: Configuration error, option master used in a master zone.
Zone transfer failed, unable to connect to master.
Could not listen on IPv6 interface.
Could not bind to an interface.

rule.match: failed while receiving responses: not authoritative
rule.description: Master is not authoritative for zone.
Could not open configuration file, permission denied.
Could not open configuration file, permission denied.

rule.match: cannot connect to|Could not connect to
rule.description: Could not connect to the dyndns server
Forcing an update, since an update has not been necessary in a while.
ddclient successfully updated the IP address.
Failed to get key exchange value
User successfully logged in using a password.

rule.match: fatal: mfa: chroot: No such file or directory
rule.description: Missing file or directory for mfa chroot

rule.match: read error: Connection reset by peer

rule.description: Sender has been rejected by an upstream mail server.
start_log is not able to seek to the proper place
Ignore SMART attribute autosave enabled messages
Ignore SMART automatic offline testing enabled messages
Ignore device found in smartd database messages.

rule.match: , is SMART capable. Adding to "monitor" list.
rule.description: Ignore device added to monitor list messages.

rule.match: smartd has fork()ed into background mode
rule.description: Ignore smartd being forked into the background messages.

rule.match: previous self-test could not complete due to a fatal or unknown error
new Self-Test Log error at hour timestamp

rule.description: Previous self-test completed, but had an error.

rule.match: appears to lack SMART Error log
rule.description: Device does not have a SMART Error log available.

rule.match: invalid next payload type RESERVED_MIN in payload of type 10
giving up on exchange ISAKMP-peer-node-ldn, no response from peer
Can't balance irqs on a uniprocessor system: failed
rule.description: An SMP machine is necessary to balance irqs.

rule.match: scsi: Device offlined - not ready after error recovery

rule.regex: type=1400 audit(\S+): avc: denied { search } for pid=\d+ comm="portrelease" name="/" dev=dm-2 ino=2 scontext=unconfined_u:system_r:portreserve_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:tmp_t:s0 tclass=dir

rule.match: lost page write due to I/O error on
error: buffer_get_bignum2_ret: negative numbers not supported
fatal: Write failed: Host is down
error: PAM: Module is unknown for
error: buffer_get_bignum2_ret: negative numbers not supported
fatal: Write failed: Host is down
error: PAM: Module is unknown for

rule.description: Attempt to start sshd when something already bound to the port.

rule.match: Authentication service cannot retrieve user credentials
rule.info: May be related to PAM module errors.
rule.description: XXX Authentication was not able to retrieve user credentials.

rule.regex: error: connect to \S+ port \d+ failed: Connection refused

rule.description: XXX PAM and gdm are not playing nicely.

rule.match: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

rule.description: A sensor is in a CRITICAL state.
A sensor is in a WARN state.
A time sensor is not working properly
Cannot bind to the assigned port.
Something is already bound to the assigned port.

rule.match: snmpe: failed to bind SNMP UDP socket
rule.description: snmpd is unable to bind to the UDP socket.

rule.match: check_child: lost child: snmp engine exited
